sql_query: SELECT T1.supplier_name ,  T1.supplier_phone FROM Suppliers AS T1 JOIN supplier_addresses AS T2 ON T1.supplier_id  =  T2.supplier_id JOIN addresses AS T3 ON T2.address_id  =  T3.address_id ORDER BY T3.address_details
question: What are the names and phone numbers of suppliers, ordered by their address details?
